programme.title: Night Waves
programme.short_synopsis: Radio 3’s flagship arts programme until 2013. Over 350 editions available in the archive.
programme.medium_synopsis: Radio 3’s flagship arts programme until 2013. Search the extensive archive for interviews, debates and reviews. Go to Free Thinking for the new home of arts and ideas on Radio 3.
